explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a white T-shirt and blue shorts is standing on a sand dune with his back to the camera, holding a yellow and blue paraglider with both hands. The sand dune has sparse green vegetation, with blue water and a white sand beach on the right. Rolling hills are in the distance, and the sky is blue.
[0-4] Then, the man swings his legs and flies upwards. The paraglider swings and takes the man first to the right and then to the left.
